permissions: Admin users only (policy requires is_user_admin? for create).
side_effects: Creates an objective stakeholder classification, generates stakeholder quote(s) asynchronously, and triggers the related objective to update OpenAI files.
validation_notes: --objective is required and must reference an objective template. --stakeholder-classification is required. --interest-degree is required and must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 1.

flags.name: --objective
flags.description: Objective ID (required; must be a template) (example: 123)

flags.name: --interest-degree
flags.validation: Value must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 1.
